examples.example: 妈妈买了一个甜甜的哈密瓜，我们一家人开心地分享着。

translate.english: Mother bought a sweet Hami melon and our whole family shared it happily.

examples.example: 我切开香甜的哈密瓜，与朋友们一起愉快地品尝。

translate.english: I cut open the sweet Hami melon and enjoy tasting it happily with friends.

examples.example: 我和朋友们一起品尝那香甜可口的哈密瓜，享受着美好的时光。

translate.english: I tasted the sweet and delicious Hami melon with my friends and enjoyed the wonderful time.
